name: eseperio/verifactu-php
description: Librería para la integración del sistema de la agencia tributaria española "Veri*factu" (verifactu)

scripts.check-env: php -r "if (!file_exists('.env') && file_exists('.env.example')) { copy('.env.example', '.env'); echo PHP_EOL . '⚠️  No .env file found. Created from .env.example. Please edit .env with your certificate details.' . PHP_EOL . PHP_EOL; }"

scripts-descriptions.test: Run the unit tests using PHPUnit
scripts-descriptions.test-readme: Test that README.md examples work correctly
scripts-descriptions.cs-fix: Fix code style issues using PHP CS Fixer
scripts-descriptions.cs-check: Check code style using PHP CS Fixer (dry run)
scripts-descriptions.quality: Run all quality checks (style, static analysis, tests)
scripts-descriptions.quality-fix: Fix all quality issues and run tests
